about_the_game:
Description

Solo development and the first game of GameLife studio - GATARI: Sand on Teeth - casual slasher of knightly tournaments.

Get new weapons in battles with bosses on an open map, performing various tasks from the inhabitants of the game world GATARI.
The battles on PVE in arenas will give you extra lives and give access to new characters. Earn game points and increase your world ranking, become the best player! The game GATARI will allow you to fight in PVP tournaments, hone your skills and become the best duel player!

Specifications:

• Choose your character type
• Character development
• Receiving Various Weapons
• Various bosses
• Restriction on revival
• Unlimited levels
 
Each level gives you a chance to get a new weapon or revival point.

Game development plans:

1. Alfa - PVE arena battles.
2. Beta - Village Defense (Tower Defense mode)

Get new weapons in battles with bosses on an open map, performing various tasks from the inhabitants of the game world GATARI.
The battles on PVE in arenas will give you extra lives and give access to new characters. Earn game points and increase your world ranking, become the best player! The game GATARI will allow you to fight in PVP tournaments, hone your skills and become the best duel player!

Specifications:

• Various bosses

name: GATARI: Sand on Teeth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Vista/8/10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon 46XX / NVIDIA GeForce GT 520 (DirectX 10.1 level video card and drivers, The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /Vista 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or higher, AMD Radeon series 77XX or higher (DirectX 11 level video card and drivers)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: GATARI: Sand on Teeth - casual slasher of knightly tournaments. Competition among players for the maximum passage of levels. Playing on the side of the Vikings or knights, boss fights. Become the best player in the world!
